Summary: Calm, clear & quiet when sighted 2 long oval amber lighted objects gliding very slowly,no noise,no trail-7+ min, I moved to yard for view as they crossed over house and lost sight.
divs: Sighting Details Calm, clear & quiet country setting when sighted 2 large long oval (cigar shaped) amber lighted objects gliding very slowly, no noise, no trail-7+ min. observation, I moved to yard for view as they crossed over house and lost sight. Objects appeared to be 100+ feet apart and equidistant laterally - one on left was diagonally behind the leader. Objects were traveling in S. E. direction.
